About Me

I'm a developer, designer, and entrepreneur born and raised in Tucson, Arizona. I am married to an amazing woman, Shelby, and we have two offspring a son, David, and a daughter, Hadassah. I build web sites, web apps, mobile apps, and servers that are scalable, performant, and beautiful. My favorite languages are JavaScript and Rust; when required I also use English. My favorite technologies are Node.js and the Browser. I am a big proponent of open-source. I believe in writing beautiful code not just beautiful interfaces.

You can find me on GitHub, NPM, Linkedin, and Facebook. To contact me or view my resume take a gander over to your right.
